Contributor: Godwin, Frank, 1889- artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "Frank Godwin." Date based on dates of America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that winning the war is the only cure for the military disease that threatens everyone. People should buy Liberty bonds to do their part. Illustration shows Uncle Sam as a doctor using his rifle to operate on a personification of the world as a patient, laying on a table. Poster appears to be a design for an advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Liberty bonds -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; Advertising, Political -- United States.;

Title: The only cure
